data.title: Kestrel Var Backstory — Dock 7 Fire and Jaw Scar
data.canon_question: What caused Kestrel Var's jaw scar, who else was involved, and how does this connect to the Dock 7 fire incident?
data.canon_answer: Kestrel Var sustained her jaw scar during the Dock 7 refinery fire (station year 2187). She was a junior safety inspector investigating rumored corner-cutting by Helion Corp contractors. The fire was not accidental—a contractor sabotaged oxygen flow regulators to hide evidence of faulty welds. Kestrel discovered the tampering moments before ignition and pulled two dock workers clear, but took shrapnel from an exploding manifold. The contractor (Jax Orin) fled station. Helion settled quietly to avoid liability. Kestrel's report was buried; she was promoted to a desk job (hush money). The scar and her cynicism about corporate oversight both stem from this incident.
